text: @abbydphillip @DJJudd Rally or no rally it's inevitably possible people will continue to test positive for the coronavirus. Stop vilifying @POTUS we've got to face the fact that everyone will eventually test positive at some point. Wearing mask can't be our new norm. I refuse to accept it...
